description: Try our easy to follow Stuffing Meatballs Wrapped In Proscuitto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Stuffing Meatballs Wrapped In Proscuitto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place dried cranberries in a small bowl, then cover with boiling water and set aside for 5 minutes or until soft.
Meanwhile, heat butter in a small frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool.

Combine mince, breadcrumbs, parsley, thyme and orange rind in a bowl. Drain dried cranberries and roughly chop. Add to mixture with onion and combine well. Roll into balls (or small sausages) and place on a plate.

Cut each slice of prosciutto in half lengthways and in half widthways. Wrap two strips around each ball and place on the baking tray. Bake, turning halfway through cooking time, for 15-20 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Tip 1: The meatballs can be prepared a day ahead and cooked on the day. Tip 2: Hall of fame: Created with Jamie Christmas Citrus & Herb Turkey Breast, marinated in zesty lemon and herbs, is a guaranteed crowd pleaser. Find it in the freezer section.
